Statement Regarding Fatal Crash of ERAU Professor

Posted on April 16, 2019

The Mayor and Prescott City Council were deeply saddened to learn of the death of Embry-Riddle Aeronautical Professor and Helicopter Program Chair Rucie Moore in a crash on April 16 in near Fountain Hills. Mayor Pro-Tem Billie Orr offered these… Read more »

NOTICE OF AMENDMENT TO INFRASTRUCTURE IMPROVEMENT PLAN AND ADOPTION OF DEVELOPMENT IMPACT FEES

Posted on April 12, 2019

Pursuant to ARS §9-463.05, public notice is hereby given that the City of Prescott Council will amend the Infrastructure Improvement Plan and adopt Development Impact fees on May 14, 2019, at 3:00 p.m. in the City Council Chambers located in… Read more »
